Now that we have reverse submarine swaps with Loop Out, you can start to see an initial method of jumping across chains with HTLCs. Swap out some LN funds to an on-chain address that is actually a submarine swap address for a LN LTC payment request: you sent coins between chains.

Today Coinbase has a deal with Visa KaratBars has a deal with Mastercard There’s literally 100 Cryptos with Visa deals. Let’s go back 1 year when it got announced Litecoin/Visa deal failed...  If you ask me I’d say it looks like it was deliberate to push Litecoin price down
